about_the_game:
In this DLC, a corresponding event unlock task will be added.
After the completion of the event, 2 new products will be added, including 12 sales and ordering functions of large displacement motorcycles.
When you install this DLC, you will get the order form of these vehicles in the backpack, and you can use the right-handed button to get the vehicle directly (in your garage).
Order and purchase need to complete the corresponding branch event to unlock.

This DLC can be used in both plot and Empire mode. Every time a new file is set up, the DLC will be activated again, and the gift will be placed in the warden's backpack.

Meanwhile, the DLC will also unlock 1 additional vehicle effects:
Drug lord seat
When warden took this carrier,all chemical raw material purchase quota +1000;All arms and counterfeit raw material purchase quota -700
